formattedAddress: 295 Madison Ave # 1709, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 295 Madison Ave # 1709, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
Clearly looks like the receptionist prioritizes old customers over new customers.

If you are groupon customer dont bother coming here you'll be last to call. If she sees a paying customer she will brush you off and focus on them.

Been siting here for an hour and I have seen people called in who came after me. No point signing in.

Had to reach out to the receptionist twice to get the patient form.

Update: Got called near closing (2 hr wait). The receptionist kept justifying that they were old customers.

originalText.text: I work as a server and i hurt my back at the gym. I found the doctor John Ward online and called them for my first visit today. Office manager Shawnee was very helpfull with process. Doctor took an x-ray, explained what might be wrong, cracked me from my neck to lower back which provided me instant relief. I’m super happy with my experience and i would recommend doctor to anyone in search of a educated and experienced chiropractor.

originalText.text: I hurt my left leg stepping onto a sidewalk I didn't see until mid-step was built too high in LA in Nov 2022. I have been in a lot of pain since symptoms appeared Feb 9, 2023. A G.P. at Kaiser Permanente I saw in April prescribed Meloxicam and a calf x-ray when I complained about my left hip. I did a cross country move and lifted 8 heavy suitcases and worked remotely on a bed. This hurt my back. Dr. Ward showed me X-rays of a torqued left pelvis on my first visit. Fingers crossed on the next 2 months of treatment.

originalText.text: Amazing work done by Dr John and employees. Very professional and helped my body get back on the right track.

text.text: Amazing work done by Dr John and employees. Very professional and helped my body get back on the right track.

originalText.text: I found Dr. Ward’s office on Groupon for a great deal (I think it was $39 for x-rays, exam and adjustment, plus 1-hour massage). I really bought the Groupon with the intent of just getting a one-time treatment and the massage, but one visit was all it took for me to realize this doctor is one in a million! There are NO words to describe how incredible Dr. Ward is. Short and to the point - he is AMAZING! By far the BEST chiropractor I've ever been to. He’s extremely knowledgeable, explains everything in detail and is thorough. I go to him on my 1-hour lunch break and he always gets me in and out fast (so that I’m never late getting back to work). His office is sanitary/clean and runs like a well-oiled machine (you’re in and out fast and you get an excellent adjustment, not a rushed adjustment). He has never failed to adjust my back and neck (without hurting me). My headaches are gone and I sleep MUCH better. I can’t really say enough positive things about Dr. Ward! Now for the office staff, Shawnee (at the front desk) is really really really incredible. Whenever I call at the last minute and want to see the doctor, she ALWAYS squeezes me in. She’s an elegant, lovely and pleasant lady who brightens up the entire office. While she isn’t a doctor, she really adds something special just by being a kind and sweet person (not to mention incredibly accommodating when fitting in last minute patients like me). Overall, this is the best chiropractor in Manhattan and I HIGHLY recommend you check it out at least once. Trust me, you won’t be sorry!
